issues_found.text_snippet: Abu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM) is a broad based international financial centre, established pursuant to Abu Dhabi Law No. 4 of 2013 in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi.
issues_found.issue: Lack of explicit reference to ADGM Courts as the exclusive jurisdiction for dispute resolution
issues_found.suggestion: Add a clause explicitly stating ADGM Courts as the exclusive jurisdiction for dispute resolution

issues_found.text_snippet: This Employment Contract is not to be deemed, considered or relied upon as legal advice
issues_found.issue: Lack of clear obligations and uncertainty
issues_found.suggestion: Use definitive binding language creating clear obligations

issues_found.text_snippet: No specific company name, employee name, or date

issues_found.suggestion: Specify ADGM Courts as the exclusive jurisdiction

issues_found.text_snippet: We, the undersigned, being the incorporating shareholders, resolve to incorporate a private company limited by shares in the Abu Dhabi Global Market under the name of [insert proposed company name]
issues_found.issue: Company name does not end with 'Limited' or 'Ltd'
issues_found.rule_reference: ADGM MoA Template Standards 2023, ADGM Companies Regulations 2020, Article 18
issues_found.suggestion: Add 'Limited' or 'Ltd' to the company name

issues_found.text_snippet: IT WAS RESOLVED that the amount of the authorised share capital of the company shall be as follows: [xxxx] USD
issues_found.issue: Share capital amount is not stated in AED with par value
issues_found.rule_reference: ADGM MoA Template Standards 2023, ADGM Companies Regulations 2020, Article 18
issues_found.suggestion: Replace USD with AED and specify par value

issues_found.section_heading: Appointment of Signatory for Incorporation Purposes
issues_found.text_snippet: IT WAS FURTHER RESOVED, that {insert authorised persons name(s)} is/are, and each acting alone is, hereby authorized to do and perform any and all such acts, including execution of any and all documents and certificates, as said person shall deem necessary or advisable, to carry out the purposes of the foregoing resolutions to complete the incorporation process with the ADGM RA
issues_found.issue: No mention of ADGM Courts as exclusive jurisdiction for dispute resolution
issues_found.suggestion: Add a clause stating ADGM Courts as exclusive jurisdiction for dispute resolution

issues_found.issue: Missing company objects clause describing business activities
issues_found.suggestion: Insert a clear and specific description of business activities in the Memorandum of Association

issues_found.text_snippet: Choose the type of legal entity.
issues_found.suggestion: Insert a liability limitation clause in the Memorandum of Association

issues_found.issue: Missing jurisdiction clause specifying ADGM Courts as the exclusive jurisdiction for dispute resolution
issues_found.suggestion: Insert a jurisdiction clause specifying ADGM Courts as the exclusive jurisdiction for dispute resolution

issues_found.text_snippet: a [private company limited by shares/restricted scope company]
issues_found.issue: Company type not specified in accordance with ADGM Companies Regulations 2020, Article 12
issues_found.suggestion: Specify the company type (e.g., private company limited by shares) in accordance with ADGM regulations

issues_found.issue: Registration number not specified in accordance with ADGM Incorporation Checklist 2024
issues_found.suggestion: Include the registration number in the document

issues_found.text_snippet: having its registered address at [insert registered office address]
issues_found.issue: Registered office address not specified in accordance with ADGM MoA Template Standards 2023
issues_found.suggestion: Specify the registered office address in accordance with ADGM regulations

issues_found.text_snippet: {insert authorised persons name(s)} is/are, and each acting alone is, hereby authorized to do and perform any and all such acts
issues_found.issue: Authorized persons not specified in accordance with ADGM Companies Regulations 2020, Article 12
issues_found.suggestion: Specify the authorized persons in accordance with ADGM regulations
